1b2596df-f186-48b9-8632-95d29f5b052d.message: Hello Jane, I wanted to share with you the latest regarding my mental health diagnosis. I have been diagnosed with major depressive disorder since February 2023 and generalized anxiety disorder since December 2022. My recent assessment has indicated that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened. Please let me know if you need any more details or if there's anything else to discuss.

33c2f512-1c93-43a6-85f5-337e81118587.message: Hi Jane, thank you for your prompt follow-up and detailed recommendations. I really appreciate your support in helping us care for Lucas alongside Mark.
